org.apache.mesos.scheduler.plan

Interface Phase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element<Block>, Observable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPhase, ReconciliationPhase

    public interface Phase
extends Element<Block>
    Defines the interface for one Phase within a Plan. A Phase is an ordered list of one or more Blocks, which each describe a single unit of work.

    For example, a Block might represent a cluster task that needs to be updated, while the Phase is a list of all of those cluster tasks.

    See Plan docs for more background.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.mesos.scheduler.plan.Element

        forceComplete, getChildren, getErrors, getId, getMessage, getName, getStatus, getStrategy, hasErrors, isComplete, isInProgress, isPending, isWaiting, restart, setStatus, update

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.mesos.scheduler.Observable

        notifyObservers, subscribe
